snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio, in his first appearance since returning from vacation, made clear that time apart from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo had not led to a change of heart.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio, in his first appearance since returning from vacation, made clear that time apart from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo had not led to a change of heart.

headline.main: De Blasio Stands by His Criticism of Cuomo
